bioAsHtml: Heiko Seeberger is Fellow at codecentric and an internationally renowned expert on Scala and Akka. He has more than 20 years of experience in consulting and software development. Heiko tweets under @hseeberger and blogs under heikoseeberger.de.

acceptedTalks.title: Learn you advanced Akka Streams for great Good!
